name: SUSTOLT
description: Stolt migration for stacked data or common-offset gathers

parameter_descriptions.cdpmin: Minimum CDP number (integer) for which to apply DMO
parameter_descriptions.cdpmax: Maximum CDP number (integer) for which to apply DMO
parameter_descriptions.noffmix: Number of offsets to mix (for unstacked data only)
parameter_descriptions.tmig: Times corresponding to RMS velocities in vmig (s)
parameter_descriptions.vmig: RMS velocities corresponding to times in tmig (m/s)
parameter_descriptions.smig: Stretch factor (0.6 typical if vrms increasing)
parameter_descriptions.vscale: Scale factor to apply to velocities
parameter_descriptions.fmax: Maximum frequency in input data (Hz), defaults to Nyquist
parameter_descriptions.lstaper: Length of side tapers (# of traces)
parameter_descriptions.lbtaper: Length of bottom taper (# of samples)
parameter_descriptions.verbose: 1 for diagnostic print, 0 for no printing
parameter_descriptions.tmpdir: Directory path prefix for storing temporary files
